title: Reinsurance collection and recovery documentation
dataVerified: Ceding company, reinsurer, claim details, reinsurer payment, collection status
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fabricated recovery documentation. Domain binding verifies reinsurer/ceding company. Multi-million dollar recoveries. Prevents double-collection fraud. Reinsurance receivables audit trail. Solvency monitoring.
